{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=PTV2000 |revision= |upc=606449076523 |ean= |asin=B004SBEVSY |price= |est_release_date=03/16/2011 |fcc_date=12/21/2010 |manuf_country=China |manuf=Pegatron |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=computer screen streamer |fcc_id=PY310400146 |ic_id=4054A-10400146 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Sigma Designs |cpu1_model= |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=K9F1G08U0B-PCB0 |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4T1G164QE-HCE6 |ram1_num=2 |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if=USB 2.0 |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3572 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none=true |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports= |wan_ports= |flags=HDMI,WiDi |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} ''Push2TVâ„¢ HDTV Adapter for Intel Wireless Display''
{{SupportPage|vendor=NETGEAR|model=PTV2000|vs_id=18162}} The processor appears to be a '''Sigma Designs''' SMP8652A.. but it's pretty blurry in the FCC photos. :"INTEL WIDI REFERENCE PLATFORM", "REV: 1.10", and "PCB_MADE_IN_CHINA" appears to be silkscreened on the main board. :"PTV-1000/V2_WIDI REV: 1.01" and "PCB MADE IN CHINA" is silkscreened on the wireless module. The manufactuer of the device is noted as '''Maintek Computer (Suzhou)''' (presumed '''Pegatron''' involvement) in the FCC test report.
